info.name: IRCCloud timestamp mod
info.description: A timestamp mod for IRCCloud. Intended to be used with IRCCloud Web Panel
info.additionalInfo: This style modifies the appearance of all timestamps. While only an example, it is a useful one in the sense it could be combined with my previous work and it may seemingly fit in. When applied, the timestamp will appear as blue tags with white text, almost similarly to Google Mail tags. When used with the web panel style linked above, it will only show on hover. It is done in this way as a design consideration; Timestamps will render on top of existing text. Due to this, they are made to stand out from existing text, and they'll only show when hovering over a post in the chat output. Update 09/19/18.1 Made text colour important, to see if that makes it so the text is always white and added animation. Update 09/21/18 "Colors update": Adds support for every possible theme which means this style will fit in seamlessly with whatever is chosen. Another major update for a very minor thing.
